name: LetterStress
description:
In LetterStress, 2-6 players will create words in front of them and hope that the cards making up those words aren’t stolen before the start of their next turn. Unstolen cards are scored at the start of your turn!

LetterStress requires that players own a copy of LetterPress (from Osprey Games), Gutenberg (from Nuts Publishing), or Movable Type (out of print).
